original_text: David and all Israel's people were singing and dancing with all their strength to praise the Lord. They made music with harps, lyres, tambourines, shakers and cymbals.
korean_text: 다윗과 이스라엘 온 족속은 잣나무로 만든 여러 가지 악기와 수금과 비파와 소고와 양금과 제금으로 여호와 앞에서 연주하더라

sentences.original_text: David and all Israel's people were singing
and dancing with all their strength
They made music with harps, lyres, tambourines, shakers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 수금, 비파, tambourine, shaker로 음악을 만들었으며
